synopsis.text:
Wizard's Tower looms high, home to the elite magicians known as Magia Vanders, and Will Selfault has his sights set on joining their ranks. Driven by a heartfelt promise to his childhood friend, he enrolls at the prestigious Regarden Magic Academy. Despite his aspirations, Will faces a seemingly insurmountable challenge: he cannot wield magic.

In a world where magical prowess is the key to success, Will's inability to cast spells leaves him at the bottom of the hierarchy. Undeterred, he hones his sword skills to battle dungeon monsters, earning credits to remain in the academy. With his classmates and instructors looking down on him, Will's journey is fraught with obstacles, including a confrontation with a bullying professor.

However, Will's unwavering determination and belief in his own unique abilities propel him forward. As he wields his ordinary sword, he strives to unlock his true potential and change the unjust reality of his country. With the promise to his childhood friend fueling his resolve, Will fights to reach the pinnacle of the magical world.
